name: The Virgin Trouble: Lucid vs Coomer
name_original: The Virgin Trouble: Lucid vs Coomer
description:
CLICK RUN GAME AND WAIT UNTIL IT STARTS :) DONT CLICK ANY BUTTONS AND DONT CLICK SPACE LMAO

CONTROLS:

Lucid: WASD to move, F and G to attack 

Coomer: Arrow keys to move, comma and period to attack

There are neutral, crouching, and aerial versions of both attacks, making for six total attacks.You can combine attacks.

Use "ASD + F" for a special attack (Throw the awaken eye)

The "story" i came up with :

Normal Lucid is on 1000+day no fap,virgin pro, handsome and woke, and he is fighting an alternate version of himself, a coomer, who is fapping all day, virgin and blue...These actions take place in one of Alex's Lucid Dreams...

Pixel 2D fighting game.Fan made game for a YouTuber named iamLucid. You can play this game with both characters, no AI, so this is a game for 2 people.

Big thanks to Hobson-TV for the base project.

Music by 8 Bit Universe

Follow me -> all social media @anesthekid
